[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][stm_spacing xs_spacing=”80px”][stm_single_image img_alignment=”right” img_id=”1199″ css=”.vc_custom_1460722316234{margin-right: 35px !important;}” img_size=”910×483″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-xs-12″][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”73px” md_spacing=”73px” sm_spacing=”30px” xs_spacing=”30px”][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Different Directions” sep_enable=”true”][/stm_title][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1455185545032{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]From 10 faculty members, 40 students and three fields of study at the time of its founding, Secondary School has grown to more than 1,600 faculty, 35,000 students and over 350 degree programs in 130 academic departments and 80 interdisciplinary research units. One of the most important things we can do for students is not just teach them specific knowledge and skills, but help them match their interests to their career path.[/vc_column_text][stm_spacing xs_spacing=”80px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1455192302689{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_image_box sep_color=”green” title=”Departments and degree programs” img_id=”517″ sep_enable=”true” title_link=”url:%23||” css=”.vc_custom_1455734118958{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]Our School`s academic enterprise is organized into 14 primary and secondary schools.[/stm_image_box][stm_image_box sep_color=”green” title=”Courses schedule” img_id=”1212″ sep_enable=”true” title_link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fsmartyschool.stylemixthemes.com%2Fcourse-schedule%2F||” css=”.vc_custom_1455734125635{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]Secondary School offers over 350 degree programs through its academic departments. Search with our A to Z guide.[/stm_image_box][stm_image_box sep_color=”green” title=”Classes” img_id=”1214″ sep_enable=”true” title_link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fsmartyschool.stylemixthemes.com%2Fclasses%2F||” css=”.vc_custom_1455734132952{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]Planning your schedule? Search available courses in everything from aerospace studies to vision science.[/stm_image_box][stm_image_box sep_color=”green” title=”Academic Calendar” img_id=”1215″ sep_enable=”true” title_link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fsmartyschool.stylemixthemes.com%2Facademic-calendar%2F||” css=”.vc_custom_1455734141062{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”]From study strategies to planning for grad school or beyond, find the resources you need to succeed at Secondary School.[/stm_image_box][stm_image_box sep_color=”green” title=”Library” img_id=”1216″ sep_enable=”true” title_link=”url:%23||”]Find faculty interests and areas of expertise in this searchable index of our secondary school.[/stm_image_box][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_title title_tag=”h3″ sep_color=”green” title=”Important Dates” sep_enable=”true” sep_margin_b=”50px” title_margin_t=”-6px”][/stm_title][stm_events view_style=”list” events_count=”1″][stm_btn_simple btn_icon_position=”right” btn_link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fsmartyschool.stylemixthemes.com%2Facademic-calendar%2F||” btn_link_text=”Full Academic Calendar” btn_icon_enable=”true” btn_margin_b=”60px”][stm_text_box title_tag=”h3″ sep_color=”custom” title_color=”custom” stm_bg_color=”green” title=”Related Information” sep_enable=”true” sep_color_custom=”#ffffff” title_color_custom=”#ffffff”]
